name: A Man Of Few Words
description: Darvo needs your help again. Save one of his best contractors from Grineer execution.

name: Apostasy Prologue
description: Inspect your personal quarters upon finishing the Chains of Harrow quest.

name: Chains Of Harrow
description: A strange transmission leads deep into the dark world of Red Veil mysticism. What evils will be found there and what do they want?

name: Hidden Messages
description: Seek out the Warframe Mirage

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.11.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed one of the Hidden Messages quest node being labeled "Solve the Riddle from the Inbox Message", which defeats the purpose of the riddle.

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: Hotfix 4
patchlogs.fixes: - Fixed an issue with the 'Hidden Messages' Quest not rewarding proper Blueprints when playing the corresponding nodes.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.5: The Jordas Precept. + Hotfix 17.5.1
patchlogs.changes: Players can now skip the crafting stages of the Hidden Messages Quest if they already have built a Mirage.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed VO not properly triggering in the Hidden Messages Quest.

patchlogs.name: Update 14.1.0: Quanta & Dendra
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed issue with progression on the Mirage ‘Hidden Messages’ quest if you already crafted the Chassis or already own a completed Mirage.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 14.0.9
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the “Hidden Messages” quest giving the wrong inbox message on the third leg of the quest. This fix includes a less ‘chatty’ Ordis for that leg of the quest.

name: Howl Of The Kubrow
description: You are Tenno, you deserve a Kubrow by your side.

name: Jordas Golem Assassinate
description: Access this assassination mission by completing the Jordas Precept quest.

patchlogs.name: Oberon Prime: Update 20.7.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Jordas Golem Assassinate mission reward being lowercase.

patchlogs.name: The War Within: Hotfix 19.0.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the level ranges displayed on navigation for the Jordas Golem Assassinate, Jordas Verdict, Law of Retribution, and Mutalist Alad V Assassinate.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.13.0: TennoGen, Passives, & Reworks
patchlogs.fixes: •    Fixed the ‘Projectile Incoming” warning message not appearing for Clients in the Jordas Golem Assassinate mission.

name: Mutalist Alad V Assassinate
description: Put an end to Alad V and his Mutalist experiments

patchlogs.name: The War Within: Hotfix 19.0.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the level ranges displayed on navigation for the Jordas Golem Assassinate, Jordas Verdict, Law of Retribution, and Mutalist Alad V Assassinate.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.10 & Tactial Alert: Divine Will
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Mutalist Alad V Assassinate Key displaying an incorrect description in the Foundry.

name: Natah
description: Strange drones have appeared in the Origin System, help the Lotus find out what they are and who sent them.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.1.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a progress stopper in the Natah quest where drones would not spawn.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove: Update 1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Second Dream quest key being given as a reward from completing the Natah quest. Players must complete the Uranus to Neptune Junction as intended.

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: Hotfix 1
patchlogs.changes: Removed the Natah and The Jordas Percept quests from Junctions as these are given out through server rewards.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.1.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Natah Quest not being flagged as completed even after the player receives their reward.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.0.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an error preventing players for receiving their inbox reward for completing the Natah Quest.  Accounts that did not properly receive their reward have been reimbursed with this hotfix.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Grineer spawning inside the wall during the the Defense mission in the Natah Quest.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.1
patchlogs.changes: Removed the Exilus Adapter Blueprint from Simaris, Natah Quest completion is now required to unlock this.

name: Octavia'S Anthem
description: Build the Mandachord and find the cause of Cephalon Suda’s erratic behavior.

name: Once Awake
description: Intercepted Grineer communications reveal that Grineer have been experimenting with some sort of bio weapon. You must investigate.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Update 22.20.0
patchlogs.additions: Added the ability to replay the Once Awake quest !

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an Infested object blocking the door near the end of the Once Awake quest.

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: Hotfix 13
patchlogs.fixes: Fix a progression stopping issue in the Once Awake quest if the player switched their active quest before claiming the Heat Sword Blueprint, and then built and sold the Heat Sword before ever switching Once Awake back to being an active quest.

patchlogs.name: Warframe: Sanctuary
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed players not receiving their reward for completing the Once Awake quest.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.13
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed redundant End Mission transmission that plays at the completion of the Once Awake quest.

name: Patient Zero
description: Find Alad V’s laboratory and put a stop to his madness

patchlogs.name: Update 19.13.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Patient Zero quest Mesa Specter holding a random purple object.

patchlogs.name: Recurring Nightmares: Hotfix #2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Nightmare missions appearing on quest nodes (e.g. Mutalist Alad V Assassination from Patient Zero quest).

patchlogs.name: Update 16.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a typo in the Patient Zero Quest line.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.6.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Patient Zero blueprint not appearing in Marketplace.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.5.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed error that would occur when attempting to select Patient Zero quest through World State Window if player had not yet unlocked Eris.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.5.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Patient Zero quest not completing for some players.

name: Sands Of Inaros
description: Help Baro Ki'Teer raid an ancient Martian tomb for a mysterious treasure.

name: Saya'S Vigil
description: On the Plains of Eidolon a mystery has lain buried for years: one that will mend or destroy a heart, and open the door to a hidden past.

name: Stolen Dreams
description: Find the thief Maroo and uncover the secrets of the Arcane Codices.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.10.0
patchlogs.additions: Added Replay Quest option for Stolen Dreams.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a progression stopping issue in the Stolen Dreams where you were unable to ‘Find the Arcane Machine’.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.4.1
patchlogs.changes: Maroo will patiently wait for the Stolen Dreams quest to be completed before she starts offering you weekly Ayatan Hunt missions.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.3: The New Protocols
patchlogs.fixes: Lowered the difficulty of the Spy Missions in the Stolen Dreams Quest.

patchlogs.name: Warframe: Sanctuary
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the dialogue between Lotus and Maroo at the final mission of Stolen Dreams being out of order.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.16 + Tactical Alert!
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed issue where Stolen Dreams would become permanently stuck in the Quest log.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.14.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed issue that caused players to have the Stolen Dreams Quest to be stuck as their active Quest.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.13.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Mission objectives not properly updating in Codex for the Stolen Dreams Quest.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.13.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Stolen Dreams Quest being replayable after completion.

name: The Archwing
description: The Balor Fomorians are coming but we are ready. Through your efforts we finally have a working Archwing prototype and I am sending you the blueprint. However, your task is not yet complete. You still must discover the component parts.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Hotfix 22.20.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed invisible Archwing during the initial The Archwing quest cinematic.

patchlogs.name: Banshee Prime: Hotfix 19.11.5 + 19.11.6
patchlogs.changes: Tweaked the last stage of The Archwing quest to include a UI objective text.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.9.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed The Archwing extraction during the Balor Formorian phase not initiating when playing in a squad as per: https://forums.warframe.com/topic/713614-the-archwing-quest-during-balor-fomorian-part-is-impossible-to-finish-if-done-in-a-squad/

patchlogs.name: Update: Specters of the Rail
patchlogs.changes: The Archwing ability stat screen will now show the correct range for abilities depending on context. (E.g. Blink used to show 100m, but in space you are 0.25x scale so distances are effectively 4x as far. So in space Blink will now show 400m. In water ranges are reduced, so Blink will show 39.69m.)

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.5.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with The Archwing Quest not being completable for players, specifically players being unable to start the Balor Fomorian mission..

patchlogs.name: Update 18.5: Sands of Inaros
patchlogs.fixes: Archwing Crafting requirements have been adjusted for players crafting the Odonata in The Archwing Quest:

name: The Glast Gambit
description: Nef Anyo has stolen the children of the Mycona Colony and it is up to you to get them back. You must challenge Nef on The Index and beat him at his own game. But Tenno, beware, not all is as it seems.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.5.1 + 19.5.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed The Glast Gambit not properly registering alignment choice

name: The Jordas Precept
description: Ordis is determined to help a fellow Cephalon overcome a ship wide infestation.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.5.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a typo in the The Jordas Precept Quest as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/538745-de-please/

patchlogs.name: Update 17.5: The Jordas Precept. + Hotfix 17.5.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed various localization issues.Please let us know if any fixes or changes appear to be missing from these notes, as monitoring the quality of such a large Update can lead to the occasional missing fix notification.  We’ll verify these claims to determine if it was something we missed, and will update this list accordingly!Thank you all for your patience and support!  We hope you enjoy Warframe: The Jordas Precept!FixesFixed unreleased Prime items replacing drops in the Void and Derelicts.

name: The Limbo Theorem
description:
The Limbo Theorem quest cannot be completed without an Archwing
Piece together the Limbo Theorem to uncover its source

name: The New Strange
description: Work with Cephalon Simaris to find the source of a mysterious voice.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.12.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a hitch in the final mission of The New Strange quest.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.7.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a progression stopping bug in The New Strange quest if the Chroma Chassis was received but never built before Specters of The Rail released.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.6.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed not being able to progress through The New Strange due to having partially completed the quest before the Specters of the Rail update.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.5.1 + 19.5.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed automatic Quest progression in The New Strange

patchlogs.name: The War Within: Hotfix 19.3.2 + 19.3.2.1
patchlogs.changes: Removed The New Strange as a requirement for starting Simaris dailies.

patchlogs.name: Update 19: The War Within
patchlogs.changes: The New Strange Defense wave count has been reduced from 10 to 5.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with the incorrect type of doors being visible during The New Strange quest.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove
patchlogs.fixes: Simplified The New Strange quest level layout and used more tiles themed around a secure facility.

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: Hotfix 12
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed not being able to progress through The New Strange quest as per: https://forums.warframe.com/topic/676594-unable-to-progress-in-the-new-strange/

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: Hotfix 4
patchlogs.fixes: - Fixed a progression stopper in 'The New Strange' where Elite Arid Lancers were required for scanning, now it just requires regular Arid Lancers.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.4.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue preventing players from accepting the Quest: The New Strange.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.8.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a typo in ‘The New Strange’ Quest dialogue.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.1.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed players being unable to accept The New Strange Quest with a controller.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.1.1
patchlogs.fixes: Slightly decreased the damage of the MK1 Braton in PvP.ChangesLiset transmissions relating to The New Strange quest will no longer continue to play while players are crafting parts.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.0.2
patchlogs.changes: ·         Chroma’s alt helmet will no longer appear in player inventories after completing The New Strange Quest.·         Removed exits from Vay Hek boss fight in Law of Retribution.·         Improved audio quality on Grineer hacking minigame.·         Made various audio adjustments to silenced weapons.·         Reduced Ordis’ conversational tendencies when in the Liset.·         Updated Mod and Market icons for Transmutation Cores.·         Updated various materials to PBR quality.·         Rescue Missions will now provide more experience at higher levels.·         Reduced the level of ambient noise in Relays.·         The Manic Grineer will now disappear after killing a player in Solo mode.·         The Manic Grineer is no longer affected by Bladestorm.
patchlogs.fixes: ·         Optimized matchmaking server code to handle load better (may fix some invitation failures).·         Reduced memory footprint in the Relays to avoid some crashes on 32-bit systems.·         Fixed issue where players could enter Conclave with no valid PvP gear during a Host migration, causing a crash.·         Fixed default PvP loadout containing non-PvP items.·         Fixed Chroma’s Spectral Scream not equipping a weapon once deactivated if the ability was used while holding a scanner.·         Fixed some instances where players could move out of bounds on Relays.·         Fixed auto-target abilities accidentally targeting player Sentinels.·         Fixed Limbo being able to trigger pressure plates while in the Rift.·         Fixed various exploits in the Law of Retribution encounters.·         Fixed rain particles looking pixelated.·         Fixed Arcane Enhancements appearing with Prime part in the Inventory.·         Fixed error that would occur when trying to equip a scanner while unarmed.·         Fixed ‘Logout’ button not bringing players back to Login screen.·         Fixed material on Steel Meridian Medallions not displaying correctly.·         Fixed various texture issues in Relays.·         Fixed additional ammo clips showing on Soma and Soma Prime.·         Fixed issue causing the Manic Grineer to become stuck on objects.·         Fixed mind controlled targets not becoming immune to Mind Control when granted immunity to powers and abilities.·         Fixed an ugly white line showing up on the floor of Grineer tilesets.·         Fixed Ogris charging effects and firing animation not displaying properly.·         Fixed players not being able to unequip Sentinels after removing primary and secondary weapons.·         Fixed Ordis’ ‘idle’ Liset transmissions interrupting other communications.·         Fixed Sentinel NPCs, voice acting, or animations showing for Clients in the first mission of The New Strange Quest.·         Fixed Chroma’s Elemental Ward buff showing as 1% off in the HUD in some instances.·         Fixed melee finishers adjusting the player camera in an unusual way.·         Fixed visual issue with Gammacor where weapon would open while holstered after melee or a quick roll.·         Fixed Huras Kubrow’s Stalk not properly applying to Players.·         Fixed Vay Hek still broadcasting his threats to Relays.·         Fixed Codex and Library scanners still showing as being equipped during a Host migration.·         Fixed both Ordis and Teshin transmission not matching corresponding subtitles.·         Fixed pistol and melee slots not being auto-equipped for default PvP loadouts.·         Fixed an error that would occur with Grineer Shipyards cranes.Small patch just went out this morning with exactly one change: fix for contact list and invites with certain types of router.

name: The Second Dream
description: The Sentient Hunhow seeks to destroy the Tenno by exploiting long forgotten secrets.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.9.2 (Phase One: DB Upgrades)
patchlogs.fixes: - Fixed a rare case of players sometimes not unlocking the Focus system when completing The Second Dream, which resulted in progression stoppers during The War Within.- Fixed progression stopper in the Grineer Shipyard tileset caused by missing Mobile Defense consoles.- Fixed a script error when using the Sibear.- Fixed a script error when casting Rhino’s Rhino Charge.- Fixed script errors in Broken Scepter and Ivara Quiver with null avatar.- Fixed being able to complete the puzzle phase of The Law of Retribution by going in and out of Transference to occupy numerous pads.- Fixed Clients missing their Archwing weapons when spawning in water at the start of the Sortie mission.- Fixed Ivara’s arrows misbehaving after casting her Artemis Bow.- Potential fix for Clients with Hysteria/Exalted Blade/Primal Fury/Artemis Bow active and running into a Nullifier briefly causing complete ability/melee/weapon switch lockout on next cast.- Fixed Automatic weapon removal in ‘Weapon Only’ Sortie missions stripping players of their Submersible weapons on Uranus.- Fixed numerous Baro Ki’Teer offerings not being Chat linkable.- Fixed mismatched ships appearing in the fly-in cinematics for Clients.- Fixed rare script error in squad overlay when mission gets aborted due to Client not having proper items equipped in loadout.- Fixed Void Fissure Reactant pickups interrupting Melee animations.- Fixed the Proto Glaive Skin not working properly on any thrown Melee weapons and appearing blurry in the Arsenal.-Fixed missing enemy death FX when using Sobex with Acid Shells as per:- Fixed enemies remaining hostile after being spotted during your first try of the Mastery Rank 9 test.- Fixed Chat issue where users with names that are prefixes for other players names were getting incorrectly notified (e.g. DEMegan getting notified if DEMegan2 gets @’ed)- Fixed a level hole in the Grineer Sealab tileset.

patchlogs.name: Update 19: The War Within
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Operator’s not having visible fingers and toes in The Second Dream diorama.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.6.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an error causing Clients to remain on a black screen when attempting to load into The Second Dream’s Save the Reservoir Mission.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.4.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an error causing Clients to end up with 50 base Armor after completing The Second Dream.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.0.6 + 18.0.6.1
patchlogs.changes: Greater Lens Blueprints will no longer appear in the Market for players who have not completed The Second Dream Quest.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.0.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed enemies not spawning with the correct level in the last Mission of The Second Dream Quest.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.0.2
patchlogs.additions: Players can now rewatch the Stalker Intro Cinematic from The Second Dream Quest via the ‘Rewatch’ button available in the Quest’s Codex.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.0.1
patchlogs.fixes: • Fixed various issues with The Second Dream Quest (no spoilers).• Fixed a hitch that would occur on the last mission of The Second Dream.• Fixed incorrect descriptions and images for the Scimitar Bundle in the Market.• Fixed an issue with Trinity's Skirt disappearing when equipping the Immortal Skin.• Fixed holding melee during a slide attack starting another slide attack.• Fixed an issue with sorting Warframe parts in the 'Misc' section of the Foundry.• Fixed an issue with certain SEA regions being unable to download the Update.

name: The Silver Grove
description: New Loka seeks help protecting a sacred forest from Grineer incursions, but are they ready to face the forest’s true nature?

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.10.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed VFX popping when viewing Warframes and The Silver Grove diorama in the Codex.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.9.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Apothic Codex entries not being given during The Silver Grove quest.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.2.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed not being able to extract in the last mission of The Silver Grove quest.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.9.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with starting The Silver Grove quest from the World State Window.

patchlogs.name: Update 19: The War Within
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed flowing water issues in The Silver Grove Shrine tileset.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove: U4.2
patchlogs.fixes: The Silver Grove: U4.2Additions:Added in Nightwatch enemy entries to the Codex.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove: U3.2
patchlogs.fixes: The Silver Grove: U3.2ChangesRemoved beams above the cryopod area in the Infested Defense level.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove: U3.1
patchlogs.fixes: The Silver Grove: U3.1FixesFixed a visual bug that caused the Prime Parts section of your Inventory to appear empty.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove: Update 1
patchlogs.changes: The Lotus will now inform you of your location to the Shrine when finding it outside of The Silver Grove quest.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed no VO playing when nearing the Shrine in The Silver Grove quest.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove: Hotfix 4
patchlogs.changes: Added additional effects to 'The Silver Grove' Shrine.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed being able to collide with the Shrine in The Silver Grove quest.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove: Hotfix 2
patchlogs.fixes: - Fixed being able to get The Silver Grove quest before completing Second Dream.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Heliocor not having information on its Blueprint location (Simaris) in the Market.Feedback Megathreads:General FeedbackTitania and The Silver Grove QuestFusion SimplifiedBug Report MegathreadLunaro Additions and ChangesNew Weapons

name: The War Within
description: A disturbance in the Somatic Link prompts the Lotus to send operatives back to the Tenno Reservoir.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Hotfix 22.20.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a progression stopping crash in The War Within.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.12.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a progression stopping crash in The War Within quest.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.12.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a stuck waypoint in the final mission of The War Within quest.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.9.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed being able to Archwing out of the level during the Archwing phase in The War Within quest.
patchlogs.additions: The War Within Choice Scene has been added to Captura! Completing The War Within for the first time will reward this in your Inbox. For those that have already completed The War Within quest, it has been retroactively added to your Captura Scene selection right on login.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.8.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a grammatical error in Teshin’s Inbox message after completing The War Within quest.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.8.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed not being able to damage the Grineer Queen for a few seconds until she quits her yappin’ in The War Within quest. The War Within speedrunners rejoice for precious seconds are SAVED!!

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.6.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed bug with Sabotage and Assault missions with “Defend the Object” in the Kuva Fortress that caused progress stoppers in The War Within.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.1.1
patchlogs.fixes: Tentatively fixed an Ostron being in a reference pose when you return to Cetus from the Plains (if you've played through The War Within and Saya's Vigil quests you'll know who I'm talking about ;) ).The following changes/fixes went live in 22.1.0 but were missing a mention in the notes, so we’re adding them here now:Increased the Resource Theft defense target’s base health from 500 to 700

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed being able to fly into one of the sections that you're supposed to walk in during The War Within.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a lighting issue in the The War Within quest.

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Hotfix 20.2.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed being able to Void Dash at an unintended moment during The War Within quest.

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Hotfix 20.1.1
patchlogs.changes: Disabled the minimap at certain times during The War Within quest as intended.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.8
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Operator having two sceptres at the end of The War Within quest.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a mini Excalibur mesh showing over top of the Operator in The War Within missions.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.11.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed getting stuck as a burrowed Maw during The War Within quest.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.9.2 (Phase One: DB Upgrades)
patchlogs.fixes: - Fixed a rare case of players sometimes not unlocking the Focus system when completing The Second Dream, which resulted in progression stoppers during The War Within.- Fixed progression stopper in the Grineer Shipyard tileset caused by missing Mobile Defense consoles.- Fixed a script error when using the Sibear.- Fixed a script error when casting Rhino’s Rhino Charge.- Fixed script errors in Broken Scepter and Ivara Quiver with null avatar.- Fixed being able to complete the puzzle phase of The Law of Retribution by going in and out of Transference to occupy numerous pads.- Fixed Clients missing their Archwing weapons when spawning in water at the start of the Sortie mission.- Fixed Ivara’s arrows misbehaving after casting her Artemis Bow.- Potential fix for Clients with Hysteria/Exalted Blade/Primal Fury/Artemis Bow active and running into a Nullifier briefly causing complete ability/melee/weapon switch lockout on next cast.- Fixed Automatic weapon removal in ‘Weapon Only’ Sortie missions stripping players of their Submersible weapons on Uranus.- Fixed numerous Baro Ki’Teer offerings not being Chat linkable.- Fixed mismatched ships appearing in the fly-in cinematics for Clients.- Fixed rare script error in squad overlay when mission gets aborted due to Client not having proper items equipped in loadout.- Fixed Void Fissure Reactant pickups interrupting Melee animations.- Fixed the Proto Glaive Skin not working properly on any thrown Melee weapons and appearing blurry in the Arsenal.-Fixed missing enemy death FX when using Sobex with Acid Shells as per:- Fixed enemies remaining hostile after being spotted during your first try of the Mastery Rank 9 test.- Fixed Chat issue where users with names that are prefixes for other players names were getting incorrectly notified (e.g. DEMegan getting notified if DEMegan2 gets @’ed)- Fixed a level hole in the Grineer Sealab tileset.

patchlogs.name: The War Within: Update 19.4.2 + 19.4.2.1
patchlogs.additions: Added translated subtitles on The War Within Quest ending screen.

patchlogs.name: The War Within: Hotfix 19.3.2 + 19.3.2.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a bug in The War Within that would make the lasers stop working in the Archwing portion.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 19.0.3
patchlogs.changes: Fixed snow appearing in cutscenes of The War Within after dying on the mountain pass.

patchlogs.name: The War Within: Hotfix 19.0.2
patchlogs.changes: Reduced the damage of Helios' Deconstructor in The War Within quest.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a crash during The War Within quest.

patchlogs.name: The War Within: Hotfix 19.0.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a crash during the Queen's fight in The War Within Quest.

name: Vor'S Prize
description:
MY QUEENS -
You were right, the Tenno threat is real. We found one drifting near Pluto but the Lotus knew we were coming. She purged the Cryo moments before we had them and sent a squad of Tenno to break our assault.
They escaped. We are working on tracing them. Separate this Tenno from the flock and it should be easy to kill. We shattered its Warframe and expect such an abrupt Cryo purge will have damaged its memories.
We anxiously await punishment for failing this task.
- VOR
